JOB DESCRIPTION: Job description    We are looking for PHP Developer, who has hands-on experience in Codeigniter/Laravel framework.  Required Experience, Skills, and Qualifications  - Hands-on Experience in web applications (PHP, Codeigniter, Laravel)  - Knowledge with front-end technologies such as Javascript, Bootstrap, HTML5, CSS, jQuery  - Experience working on Apache HTTP or any other server.  - Experience using MySQL.  - Solid experience in design, coding, unit testing and debugging.  - Experience working in agile development environment.  Required Skills  - Should have strong knowledge in PHP with Codeigniter/Laravel.  - Should have Knowledge of Full life cycle application development.  - Design, code, and debug software.  - Integrate new software solutions with existing systems.  - Extract and reverse engineer existing code.    Keyskills    PHP 7   HTML 5   CSS 3   Java Script   jQuery   Bootstrap 4   Codeigniter   Laravel   Ajax   MySql    Desired candidate profile    Qualification: Any Graduate
